article_title: Paul Ryan Speaks About Obamacare Repeal, North Korea
article_text:
Full Show: Surveillance (05/10)

39:14 - Bloomberg Surveillance hosted by Tom Keene and Francine Lacqua. Guest include Neil Dutta, U.S. economics head at Renaissance Macro, Adam Cole, head of global FX strategy at RBC, Jeffrey Rosenberg, chief investment strategist at BlackRock, Mickey Levy, chief U.S. and Asia Economist at Berenberg Capital, and James Steel, chief commodities analyst at HSBC. (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: House Speaker Paul Ryan speaks about a bill to repeal the Affordable Care Act's core provisions, President Barack Obama's executive actions on gun control and North Korea's claim that it successfully tested a hydrogen bomb. Representative Greg Walden, an Oregon Republican, joins Ryan at the news conference in Washington and speaks about a standoff at a national wildlife refuge in his district. (Source: Bloomberg)
